name: Zirius Arena
description: Online Game of player versus player battles where opponents face each other on a playing field to choose between 3 classes: The furious warrior, protector of order and peace. The cunning druid, guardian of nature and empowerment in metamorphosis. and the ingenious magician, defender of the arcane and guardian of eternal magical knowledge  You choose how to fight, but only one survivor, who waits to join this new game!
